channel.title: Friend can run any Batch Files HELP
channel.description: hello, i am having this problem that when i run my server client it opens fine and what not, another one a my friends works as well, but when i give it to my friend Joe, he can even open the Batch files... Any ideas on how to fix this?

item.title: Friend can run any Batch Files HELP
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“dubble0jon, post:3, topic:437110”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539824.msg3952109#msg3952109 date=1332373618]
Tis not the file itself most likely, its his software he may have a virus(they can block batch files).
Interesting thread title.
[/quote]
What? I’m guessing you meant you missed a t in the batch file’s code… Well usually I assume the code was correctly made and previously tested and there was no errors cause it was being blocked which is a very likely cause for these things. Check over your code before posting, its annoying to find it was something so silly which you clearly could’ve fixed yourself…

yeah missed the T, get over it, i already did lol X[)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Friend can run any Batch Files HELP
